RTCErrorEvent.summary: The WebRTC API's RTCErrorEvent interface represents an error sent to a WebRTC object. It's based on the standard interface, but adds RTC-specific information describing the error, as shown below.

remarks.para:
-WebRTC API
-
-The error event occurs on the following interfaces: and
-

RTCErrorEventError.summary:
The read-only property error
contains an object describing the details of the error which the
event is announcing.
RTCErrorEventError.value:
An object whose properties provide details about the error
which has occurred in the context of a WebRTC operation.
